Welcome to Lineage²!

Simply put, every character will have the ability to "Unlock" every Class in the game. (Press Alt + B, then choose Favorite)
Players will only be allowed to combine Same-Race Classes. No Mutants allowed! Sorry Hawkeye/Tyrant lovers, but this server isn't for you!
To get started, simply make your first class combination at this NPC.
To Unlock more Classes, you can obtain a "Sub Class Reward" item from any Raid Boss in the game!
Thats all for now! Good luck, and happy Stacking! ^.^
